TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MailAddress extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示电子邮件发件人或收件人的地址。

span.span: Represents the address of an electronic mail sender or recipient.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和类使用类 存储电子邮件地址信息。The class is used by the and classes to store address information for email messages. 邮件地址由 名称、 名称和（可选）组成 。A mail address is composed of a name, name and optionally, a . 如果对其进行编码，则可以包含非 ASCII 字符。The can contain non-ASCII characters if you encode them. 类支持以下邮件地址格式：The class supports the following mail address formats: - 的简单地址格式 `user@host` 。A simple address format of `user@host`. 如果 未设置，则这是生成的邮件地址格式。If a is not set, this is the mail address format generated. - 的标准带引号显示名称格式 `"display name" ` 。A standard quoted display name format of `"display name" `. 如果 设置了，则这是生成的格式。If a is set, this is the format generated. - 如果未包括尖括号，则在名称和名称周围添加尖括号 。Angle brackets are added around the name and name, if these are not included. 例如， `"display name" user@host` 将更改为 `"display name" ` 。For example, `"display name" user@host` is changed to `"display name" `. - 如果未包括引号，则添加引号。Quotes are added around the , if these are not included. 例如， `display name ` 将更改为 `"display name" ` 。For example, `display name ` is changed to `"display name" `. - 属性中支持 Unicode 字符 。Unicode characters are supported in the property. - 带有引号的名称。A name with quotes. 例如 `"user name"@host`。For example, `"user name"@host`. - 用户名中的连续和尾随点。Consecutive and trailing dots in user names. 例如 `user...name..@host`。For example, `user...name..@host`. - 括起来的域文本。Bracketed domain literals. 例如 ``。For example, ``. - 备注。Comments. 例如 `(comment)"display name"(comment)<(comment)user(comment)@(comment)domain(comment)>(comment)`。For example, `(comment)"display name"(comment)<(comment)user(comment)@(comment)domain(comment)>(comment)`. 在传输之前将删除注释。Comments are removed before transmission. 逗号用于分隔邮件地址列表中的元素。A comma is used to separate elements in a list of mail addresses. 因此，不应在列表中的无引号显示名称中使用逗号。As a result, a comma should not be used in unquoted display names in a list. 允许使用以下邮件地址：The following mail addresses would be allowed: `"John, Doe" , "Bob, Smith" ` 不允许使用以下邮件地址：The following mail address would not be allowed: `John, Doe , Bob, Smith ` 可以将引号嵌入到带引号的字符串中，但必须对其进行转义。Quotes can be embedded in a quoted string, but they must be escaped. 允许使用以下邮件地址：The following mail addresses would be allowed: `"John \"Jr\" Doe" ` `"\"John \\\"Jr\\\" Doe\" "` 不允许使用以下邮件地址：The following mail address would not be allowed: `"John "Jr" Doe" ` 如果未将用户名括在引号中，则字符串开头 (或) 逗号之间的所有文本都将被视为的一部分 ，包括注释。When the username is not quoted, all text between the start of the string (or comma) and the address are considered part of the , including comments. 例如：For example: `(non comment) unquoted display (non comment) name (non comment) ` 尽管 类接受邮件地址为有效，但其他邮件服务器可能不会接受该邮件地址。Although the class accepts a mail address as valid, other mail servers may not accept the mail address. 类不支持以下邮件地址格式：The class does not support the following mail address formats: - 带引号和无引号的显示名称。Mixed quoted and unquoted display names. 例如 `display "name" `。For example, `display "name" `. - 由 IETF 发布的 RFC 2822 第3.4 节中定义的组。Groups, as defined in RFC 2822 Section 3.4 published by the IETF. - 的过时用户名格式为 `"user"."name"@host` `user."name"@host` 或 `"user".name@host` 。The obsolete user name formats of `"user"."name"@host`, `user."name"@host` or `"user".name@host`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过使用 、和类发送电子邮件 。The following code example demonstrates sending an email message by using the , , and classes. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `address`如果将地址括在尖括号中，参数可以包含显示名称和关联的电子邮件地址。The `address` parameter can contain a display name and the associated email address if you enclose the address in angle brackets. 例如：For example: `"Tom Smith "` 显示名称与尖括号之间允许有空格。White space is permitted between the display name and the angle brackets. 下表显示了 使用上述示例地址构造的对象的属性值。The following table shows the property values for a object constructed using the preceding example address. |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`"Tom Smith"`| ||`"contoso.com"`| ||`"tsmith"`| ||`"tsmith@contoso.com"`| ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此构造函数为电子邮件的收件人创建一个 对象 。The following code example uses this constructor to create a object for the recipient of an email message. summary.span: 使用指定的地址和显示名称序列化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified address and display name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 保留显示名称中的前导空格和尾随空格。Leading and trailing white space in the display name is preserved. 如果 `displayName` 包含非 ASCII 字符，则使用 iso-8859-1 字符集进行 `displayName` 编码。If `displayName` contains non-ASCII characters, the iso-8859-1 character set is used for the `displayName` encoding. RFC 1522 中讨论了编码非 ASCII 字符，在中提供了此功能 [https://www.ietf.org/](https://www.ietf.org/) 。Encoding non-ASCII characters is discussed in RFC 1522, which is available at [https://www.ietf.org/](https://www.ietf.org/). 如果 `address` 包含显示名称，并且不为 `displayName` `null` 且不等于，则将 `displayName` 重写中指定的值 `address` 。If `address` contains a display name, and `displayName` is not `null` and is not equal to , `displayName` overrides the value specified in `address`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此构造函数为 电子邮件的发件人和收件人创建实例。The following code example uses this constructor to create instances for the sender and recipient of an email message. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 保留显示名称中的前导空格和尾随空格。Leading and trailing white space in the display name is preserved. 如果 `address` 包含显示名称，并且不为 `displayName` `null` 且不等于，则将 `displayName` 重写中指定的值 `address` 。If `address` contains a display name, and `displayName` is not `null` and is not equal to , `displayName` overrides the value specified in `address`. 方法不检查 `displayName` 参数是否有效。The method does not check if the `displayName` parameter is valid. 此方法删除属性未显示的两侧引号 。This method removes surrounding quotes not displayed by the property. 如果 在参数中指定了或，则在传输前将添加引号 `displayNameEncoding` 。Quotes will be added before transmission, except where or is specified in the `displayNameEncoding` parameter. 参数中指定的编码 `displayNameEncoding` 将在传输之前应用于 属性， 或 在参数中指定 `displayNameEncoding` 。The encoding specified in the `displayNameEncoding` parameter will be applied to the property before transmission or is specified in the `displayNameEncoding` parameter. 如果未指定，则为默认编码。 is the default encoding if none is specified. 有关支持的邮件地址格式的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on supported mail address formats, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此构造函数为 电子邮件的发件人创建实例。The following code example uses this constructor to create instances for the sender of an email message. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在典型的电子邮件地址中，主机字符串包含 "" 符号后面的所有信息 `@` 。In a typical email address, the host string includes all information following the "`@`" sign. 例如，在中 `"tsmith@contoso.com"` ，主机为 `"contoso.com"` 。For example, in `"tsmith@contoso.com"`, the host is `"contoso.com"`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示电子邮件的目标。The following code example displays the destination of an email message.
